CustomField.description: Field created to concateinate partcode and part revision as per HWST-3679
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(HWS_Source__c = 'PUMA2',CONTAINS(HWS_Version_Code__c,HWS_Hardware_Sellable_Item__r.CARE_PartCode__c)), SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(HWS_Version_Code__c, "(", ""), ")", ""), " ", ""), "-", ""), "&", ""), ".", ""), "%", ""), "#", ""), "/", ""), ";", ""), ":", ""), "\"", ""), "_", ""), ",", ""), Case (HWS_Source__c, "PUMA1", SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(HWS_Version_Code__c, "(", ""), ")", ""), " ", ""), "-", ""), "&", ""), ".", ""), "%", ""), "#", ""), "/", ""), ";", ""), ":", ""), "\"", ""), "_", ""), ",", ""), "PUMA2", SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(HWS_Hardware_Sellable_Item__r.CARE_PartCode__c, "(", ""), ")", ""), " ", ""), "-", ""), "&", ""), ".", ""), "%", ""), "#", ""), "/", ""), ";", ""), ":", ""), "_", ""), ",", ""), "\"", "")&SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(HWS_Version_Code__c, "(", ""), ")", ""), " ", ""), "-", ""), "&", ""), ".", ""), "%", ""), "#", ""), "/", ""), ";", ""), ":", ""), "\"", ""), "_", ""), ",", ""), "" ))
CustomField.label: HWS Part Code-Part Revision
